quote: For what it’s worth, it’s never too late to be whoever you want to be. I hope you live a life you’re proud of, and if you find you’re not, I hope you have the strength to start over.
author: F. Scott Fitzgerald

quote: Life is a dance. Mindfulness is witnessing that dance.
author: Amit Ray

quote: Each morning we are born again. What we do today is what matters most.
author: Buddha

quote: Let go of the battle. Breathe quietly and let it be. Let your body relax and your heart soften.
author: Jack Kornfield

quote: Do not let the behavior of others destroy your inner peace.
author: Dalai Lama

quote: The best way to take care of the future is to take care of the present moment.
author: Thich Nhat Hanh

quote: The best way to capture moments is to pay attention. This is how we cultivate mindfulness. Mindfulness means being awake.
author: Jon Kabat Zinn

quote: Every emotion is connected with the breath. If you change the breath, change the rhythm, you can change the emotion.
author: Sri Sri Ravi Shankar

quote: Every time we become aware of a thought, as opposed to being lost in a thought, we experience that opening of the mind.
author: Joseph Goldstein

quote: With awareness, we can make concious choices, instead of letting our habitual thoughts and patterns run the show.
author: Tamara Levitt

quote: Mindfulness gives you time. Time gives you choices. Choices, skillfully made, lead to freedom.
author: Bhante Henepola Gunaratana

quote: Everything is created twice. First in the mind and then in reality.
author: Robin Sharma

quote: If you can’t do anything about it, then let it go. Don’t be a prisoner to things you can’t change.
author: Buddha

quote: Realize deeply that the present moment is all you have.
author: Eckhart Tolle

quote: The body benefits from movement, and the mind benefits from stillness.
author: Sakyong Mipham

quote: The mind is like water. When it’s turbulent, it’s difficult to see. When it’s calm, everything becomes clear.
author: Prasad Mahes

quote: There is no way to happiness. Happiness is the way.
author: Thich Nhat Hanh

quote: Training your mind to be the present moment is the number one key to making healthier choices.
author: Susan Albers

quote: Mindfulness is deliberately paying full attention to what is happening around you– in your body, heart, and mind. Mindfulness is awareness without criticism or judgment.
author: Jan Chozen Bays

quote: Happiness, not in another place but this place… not for another hour, but this hour.
author: Walt Whitman
